      • getSingleTrip

        public TicketCollection getSingleTrip(java.lang.String dCity,
                                      java.lang.String aCity,
                                      java.lang.String dDate)
        Retrieve all the flight-Legs union for single trip from dCity to aCity on a specific dDate
        Specified by:
        getSingleTrip in interface RequestFlightService
        Parameters:
        dCity - The departing airport city chosen by user
        aCity - The arriving airport city chosen by user
        dDate - The departing date chosen by user
        Returns:
        Collection of [ flight1: [flight-leg11, flight-leg12, flight-leg13] flight2: [flight-leg21, flight-leg22] ...... flightn: [flight-legn1, flight-legn2, flight-legn3] ]

      • getRoundTrip

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<Ticket>> getRoundTrip(java.lang.String dCity,
                                                           java.lang.String aCity,
                                                           java.lang.String dDate,
                                                           java.lang.String returnDate)
        Description copied from interface: RequestFlightService
        Return List of list of tickets of the request round trip ticket Get the request parameter from the UI for round trip, including departing city, arriving city, departure time, arrival time, and return all the tickets in List for iteration
        Specified by:
        getRoundTrip in interface RequestFlightService
        Parameters:
        dCity - departing city airport code - departing trip
        aCity - arriving city airport code - arriving trip
        dDate - departing time (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) - departing trip
        returnDate - arriving time (Format: YYYY-MM-DD) - arriving trip
        Returns:
        List of list of tickets [ [departing tickets] [returning tickets] ]
